An excellent price for an excellent TV to pair with your PlayStation console.

Walmart is offering the best deal right now on an OLED TV. You can pick up a 65" LG B3 4K OLED Smart TV for only $998 (sold and shipped from Walmart direct). That's an outstanding price for a 65" OLED TV, especially an LG brand. The B3 is a 2023 model that's less expensive than the LG's C-series OLED TVs. The differences are relatively minor: The B3 only has two HDMI 2.1 inputs instead of four, it lacks the "Evo" panel so it's less bright, and it has an older generation processor.

65" LG B3 4K OLED Gaming TV for $998

65" LG B3 4K OLED Smart TV

OLED TVs are considered the best TVs you can buy right now. Compared to traditional LED LCD TVs, they offer better image quality, deeper blacks, better contrast ratio, wider color gamut, and super fast response times. Because of these advantages, the OLED TV are easily the best type of TV for viewing 4K HDR content in all of its intended glory. It’s a sight to behold, especially when you add in the deep blacks and well-balanced colors on the crisp 4K screen. Once you choose OLED, it's hard to go back to anything else. LG OLED TVs particular benefit from several generations of updates.

The LG B3 also has the features you'd want in a gaming TV. It has a native 120Hz panel and two HDMI 2.1 ports capable of running 4K at 120Hz on a PS5 or Xbox Series X. It also supports variable refresh rate and auto low latency mode.
